title: Ticket #1120: Environment variable not overriding value in config file
description: While attempting to solve the kbdd log issue, I overwrote the kbdd_log value with the environment variable _condor_kbdd_log. This was pointed to the TEMP directory, but for some reason the kbdd continues to insist writing its log to the c:\condor\log directory. This was determined through using ProcMon, which showed it was opening the KbddLog in that directory.
remarks:
2010-Sep-27 13:06:13 by tstclair:
just as a side note, I do this all the time, I don't believe this is real.
creator: ziliang
